name: One Last Recycle
description:
--- A B O U T - - -
One Last Recycle is a game where the player has only a few seconds to pick up trash and recycle it, will you keep recycling or will you run out of time?? This game was made in JUST 3 hours, for Trijam #194. ----->> https://itch.io/jam/trijam-194 , The theme was: "Recycling Is Essential."          ---     Let me know what you think!

--- C O N T R O L S ---

-WSAD to move.

-Aim and press space to dash, (has a 2 seconds cooldown.

-Click while touching trash to grab, (you can only grab 1 at a time.

-Click while touching recycling bin to recycle.

-If there is enough trash on the ground or if you run out of time you loose. (you get more time by recycling.
